events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking page shows no updates and I am worried about the delay.
The customer has reported a significant shipping delay with no updates on the tracking information.
Assigning the case to the logistics support team to investigate the shipment delay.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. I’ll do my best to help resolve this delay quickly.
Could you please provide the order number and the shipping address so I can look into the shipment status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 45 Maple Street, Springfield.
I have contacted the courier service and found that your package was delayed in transit due to a logistics issue. They expect delivery within 3 days.
Thanks for the update. I’m disappointed but I appreciate knowing when to expect my delivery now.
We have resolved the inquiry by confirming the updated delivery estimate. Please contact us if the package does not arrive within that timeframe.
We are just checking in to confirm that your package has arrived safely. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since no further issues were reported after delivery, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience!
